entry.string: The XML-RPC validator API is a XML-RPC API used to validate a XML-RPC installation on conformance to the specification. It implements the necessary methods on the server so test clients can validate whether the server conforms to the specification.
In Xaraya the xmlrpcserver module is responsible for providing the xmlrpc transport needed for this API functionality. This module will not function without the xmlrpcserver module activated.
You can find a validation service at
You can use this to validate whether the Xaraya XML-RPC server conforms to the standard.
Further information on the Xmlrpcvalidatorapi module can be found at
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
Related tutorials and documentation on Xmlrpcvalidatorapi found at
